trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_CHAMBERLAIN00466_000_000<tab>If you are here for the Valentione's event, I'm afraid the venue is overcrowded at present. We ask for your patience and understanding.

TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_CHAMBERLAIN00466_000_010<tab>Greetings and welcome, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>. If you wish to undertake the Valentione's Ceremony, I should be pleased to assist you.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_Q1_000_000<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_MENU_CONTENT<tab>Undertake the Valentione's Ceremony.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_A1_000_002<tab>Learn about the Valentione's Ceremony.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_YESNO_CONTENT<tab>Proceed to the Valentione's Ceremony venue?
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_Q2_000_000<tab>What would you like to ask?
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_A2_000_001<tab>What is the Valentione's Ceremony?
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_A2_000_002<tab>What happens in the ceremony?
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_A2_000_003<tab>Tell me about the first trial.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_A2_000_004<tab>Tell me about the second trial.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_A2_000_005<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_CHAMBERLAIN00466_000_020<tab>The Valentione's Ceremony is a series of light-hearted trials that measure the affinity between two souls. We should be pleased if the ceremony serves as your first step together on the journey of love.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The Valentione's Ceremony is an instance designed for a party of two. There are no class, job, or level requirements for participation.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>In the event that you register for the ceremony alone, your partner will be found via the matching system.

TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_CHAMBERLAIN00466_000_030<tab>The ceremony comprises two trials, which are collectively known as the Trials of the Moon. Overcoming them will require cooperation, communication, patience─such things as form the foundation of a strong relationship.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The Valentione's Ceremony is made up of two mini-games: “Till Mog Do Us Part” and “Cards Beat as One.”
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>Upon the completion of both, you will receive an affinity rating for your party.

TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_CHAMBERLAIN00466_000_040<tab>In the first trial, you and your partner must make your way through an obstacle-filled maze. Though you each will have your own path, you must avoid straying far from one another, lest your bond be broken.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>In the trial “Till Mog Do Us Part,” you and your partner are joined by a magical chain.

TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>Straying too far from one another will cause the chain to break, during which time the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Affinity<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> bar will slowly drain.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>Being attacked by moogles will also drain the bar.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>If the bar is completely drained, the duty will end in failure, and you will be ejected from the instance.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_045<tab>Completion time and remaining Affinity influence your final rating while determining your bonus for the second trial, “Cards Beat as One.”
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_CHAMBERLAIN00466_000_050<tab>The second trial challenges your powers of recollection and reasoning, while calling on a bit of luck and cooperation for good measure.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>The trial “Cards Beat as One” is a card-matching game. Twelve cards will be laid out, and couples must cooperate to turn over matching pairs.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>If you guess incorrectly, you will be required to select again until all cards have been matched.
TEXT_FESVLT2018ENTRANCE_00466_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>The number of incorrect guesses influences your final affinity rating.
